column4: Choices (note: 0 indexed, this is max value)

column3: Global volume. The volume of other sounds is multiplied by this value.
SFX volume. Volume of most sound effects.
Text volume. Volume of the text bleep sounds.
System volume. Volume of system sound effects (e.g. sounds that menus make)
